price: 76. Wij zijn niet onrechtvaardig voor hen maar zij waren de onrechtplegers.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
